articles.author: Mike Florio
articles.title: Vikings need to see if J.J. McCarthy will succeed, or fail, at NFL level - NBC Sports
articles.content:
Its time.
When the Vikings play their next game, nine days from now against the Lions, they need to see what quarterback J.J. McCarthy can do.
His high ankle sprain was, were told, was a 4-6 week i… [+1490 chars]

articles.author: Mark Schlabach, Pete Thamel
articles.title: Sources: SEC suspends Georgia-Auburn referee - ESPN
articles.description: The SEC has suspended longtime referee Ken Williamson for the remainder of the season in the wake of his crew's performance in Georgia's 20-10 victory at Auburn on Oct. 11, sources confirmed to ESPN on Thursday.
articles.content:
Oct 23, 2025, 06:12 PM ET
